original: shr'i tsandra de b'i n'a ma s'a dha nam /
analyzed: shr tsandra de b na ma sa dha nam

original: dpal zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: dpal zla ba lha mo zhes byed ba sgrub thabs

original: aom shr'i zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya ba aa pa tsha ra de /
analyzed: aom shr zla ba lha mo zhes byed ba aa ba tsha ra de

original: gong bzhin du 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: gong bzhin du phag ba gshin rje gshed kyi rnal byor ba

original: mdun du aa pa tshar zhes bya ba'i lha mo rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa shin tu mdzes ma cig bsgoms la gong bzhin du dgug pa la sogs pa dang mchod pa byas te 'ong bar bsams na nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdun du aa ba tshar zhes byed ba lha mo rgyan kun gyis rgyan ba shin tu mdzes ma cig sgom la gong bzhin du gugs ba la sogs ba dang mchod ba byed te ng ba bsams na nges ba grub ba gyur ro

original: gal te bzlas pas 'grub par 'dod na de'i tshe ri'i rtse mo 'am skye bos dben pa'i gnas su gong @155a * //
analyzed: gal te bzlas ba grub ba dod na de tshe ri rtse mo mang skye bod dben ba gnas su gong

original: bzhin du mchod pa byas te sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: bzhin du mchod ba byed te sngags bum phrag gcig bzla ba byed

original: de nas nya'i dus su ji ltar 'byor pas mchod pa byas la /
analyzed: de nas nya dus su ji ltar byor ba mchod ba byed la

original: mar gyi mar mes mtshan thog thag la bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: mar gyi mar mes mtshan thogs thag la bzlas ba byed

original: de'i tho rangs lha mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de tho rangs lha mo ng ba gyur ro

original: byung ba dang tsandan gyi mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: byung ba dang tsandan gyi mchod yon bul ba byed

original: bdag gis khyed kyi ci bgyi zhes zer na /
analyzed: bdag gis khyed kyi ci bgyid zhes zer na

original: bdag gi bud med gyis shig ces brjod do //
analyzed: bdag gi bud med gyis shig ces rjod do

original: de nas grub pa'i rjes dang dngul chu dang bcud len la sogs pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas grub ba rjes dang dngul chu dang bcud len la sogs ba thams cad ster ba gyur ro

original: gang gis grub pa de lo stong thub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis grub ba de lo stong thub ba gyur ro

original: zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: zla ba lha mo zhes byed ba sgrub thabs rdzogs so
